info.title: Content API - TripAdvisor(Knowledge)
info.description: SSP includes Locations Details, Locations Photos, Locations Reviews, Location Search

get.description: A Location Details request returns comprehensive information about a location (hotel, restaurant, or an attraction) such as name, address, rating, and URLs for the listing on Tripadvisor.

parameters.name: locationId
parameters.description: A unique identifier for a location on Tripadvisor. The location ID can be obtained using the Location Search.

parameters.name: language
parameters.description: The language in which to return results (e.g. "en" for English or "es" for Spanish) from the list of our Supported Languages.

parameters.name: currency
parameters.description: The currency code to use for request and response (should follow ISO 4217).

location_id.description: Unique Tripadvisor location ID of the destination or POI

name.description: Name of the POI as listed on Tripadvisor

description.description: Description of the POI as listed on Tripadvisor

web_url.description: Link to the POI detail page on Tripadvisor. Link is localized to the correct domain if a language other than English is requested.

address_obj.description: Object containing address data for this location

address_string.description: The address in one single sentence

ancestors.description: Ancestors describe where the POI or destination lives within the Tripadvisor destination or geo hierarchy.From this, you can derive the city where a POI is located, as well as state/province/region and country.

level.description: The ancestor location level in relation to the location

latitude.description: The latitude of this location in degrees, if available

longitude.description: The longitude of this location in degrees, if available

email.description: The email of the location, if available

phone.description: The phone number of the location, if available

website.description: The website of the location, if available

write_review.description: Link to the review form for this specific POI on Tripadvisor. Link is localized to the correct domain if a language other than English is requested.

ranking_data.description: Describes a POI's Popularity Index ranking on Tripadvisor, which compares places of interest (accomodations, restaurants, and attractions) within the same destination based on their popularity.This is measured by the quality, quantity, and recency of their review content on Tripadvisor.

ranking_out_of.description: The total number of locations on the ranking score

rating.description: Overall rating for this POI. Not applicable to geographic locations. Rating levels are defined as follows:5: Excellent4: Very good3: Average2: Poor1: Terrible

rating_image_url.description: URL to the bubble rating image for this location. Overall Bubble Ratings must be displayed using the Tripadvisor bubble rating image with the owl icon.

num_reviews.description: Count of total reviews published for this location

review_rating_count.description: Count of reviews for this location at each traveler rating level (1,2,3,4,5)

photo_count.description: The count of photos for this POI published on Tripadvisor

see_all_photos.description: Link to open all photos posted for this POI in a photo viewer on Tripadvisor. Link is localized to the correct domain if a language other than English is requested.

price_level.description: The relative price level for the POI. Not available for all POIs. This string is localized to other currency symbols (e.g. ££££ or €€€€) if a language other than English (en_US) is requested or if a specific currency is selected.

hours.description: Provides localized opening hours for Restaurants and Attractions, using ISO 8601 format

open.description: The day and times intervals in which the location is open

close.description: The day and times intervals in which the location is closed

amenities.description: The amenities provided by this hotel

features.description: The features provided by this restaurant

parent_brand.description: The parent brand of this hotel

category.description: Each POI on Tripadvisor is classified under a "category" and "subcategory", which is included in the API response.

subcategory.description: Listings that are accommodations/hotels or restaurants are assigned a single subcategory.Deprecated as of February 2017 for Attractions. Refer to the "groups" object for the most up to date classifications.

groups.description: Hierarchical display of Attraction Groups and Categories. These fields are only applicable for location type "attraction".

neighborhood_info.description: List of neighborhoods close to the location

trip_types.description: Each review submitted on Tripadvisor is tagged with a trip type, as designated by the reviewer.For each POI location, a breakdown of the total review count by trip type is included in the "trip_types" object.

awards.description: Returns a list of all of the awards for this location, which could include Certificate of Excellence, Travelers' Choice, and Green Leader.For each award, a small and large image will be returned as well.

year.description: The year in which the award was awarded

images.description: The award image in its different sizes

categories.description: The categories in which the award was awarded

get.description: The Location Photos request returns up to 5 high-quality photos for a specific location. Please note that the limits are different for the beta subscribers. You need to upgrade to get the higher limits mentioned here.The photos are ordered by recency.Sizes (height x width) for each photo type are as follows:Thumbnail: Fixed 50x50px, cropped, resized, and optimized by TripadvisorSmall: Fixed 150x150px, cropped, resized, and optimized by TripadvisorMedium: Max dimension 250px (can be height or width, depending on photo orientation), the other dimension is resized to maintain the aspect ratioLarge: Max dimension 550px (same rules as Medium, resized to maintain aspect ratio)Original: This is the photo in its original resolution and aspect ratio as provided by the user who submitted it.

parameters.name: locationId
parameters.description: A unique identifier for a location on Tripadvisor. The location ID can be obtained using the Location Search.

parameters.name: language
parameters.description: The language in which to return results (e.g. "en" for English or "es" for Spanish) from the list of our Supported Languages.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The number of results to return

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: The index of the first result

parameters.name: source
parameters.description: A comma-separated list of allowed photo sources. Allowed values are 'Expert', 'Management', 'Traveler'. If not specified, allow photos from all sources.

id.description: A unique ID for this photo

is_blessed.description: Boolean whether or not this photo is blessed, i.e. reviewed at Tripadvisor as being a photo of exceptional quality

album.description: Name of the album the photo is featured in

published_date.description: Date when this photo was published to Tripadvisor

images.description: Links to the photo in various sizes, along with the dimensions in pixels of each size

source.description: Origin of the photo (Traveler, Expert, Management)

username.description: The username that appears on the Tripadvisor website for the user

name.description: The name of the user's location

id.description: The location ID of the user's location

review_count.description: The Review Count that appears on the Tripadvisor website for the user

reviewer_badge.description: The Reviewer Badge that appears on the Tripadvisor website for the user

get.description: The Location Reviews request returns up to 5 of the most recent reviews for a specific location. Please note that the limits are different for the beta subscribers. You need to upgrade to get the higher limits mentioned here.

parameters.name: locationId
parameters.description: A unique identifier for a location on Tripadvisor. The location ID can be obtained using the Location Search.

parameters.name: language
parameters.description: The language in which to return results (e.g. "en" for English or "es" for Spanish) from the list of our Supported Languages.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The number of results to return

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: The index of the first result

id.description: The Tripadvisor ID for the review.

location_id.description: Unique Tripadvisor location ID of the destination or POI.

published_date.description: The date the review was published to Tripadvisor.

rating.description: Overall rating for this POI. Not applicable to geographic locations. Rating levels are defined as follows:5: Excellent4: Very good3: Average2: Poor1: Terrible

rating_image_url.description: The URL to the bubble rating image for this location.

trip_type.description: The Trip type of the review (Business, Couples, Family, Friends, Solo).

travel_date.description: The travel date of the review

text.description: The full text of the review.

owner_response.description: The Management Response to this review, if one exists.

id.description: The Tripadvisor ID for the owner respose.

text.description: The full text of the review.

published_date.description: The date the review response was published to Tripadvisor.

is_machine_translated.description: True or false depending on whether this is a machine-translated review. (Outputs only if partner configured for inclusion of machine-translated reviews)

username.description: The username that appears on the Tripadvisor website for the user

name.description: The name of the user's location

id.description: The location ID of the user's location

review_count.description: The Review Count that appears on the Tripadvisor website for the user

reviewer_badge.description: The Reviewer Badge that appears on the Tripadvisor website for the user

get.description: The Location Search request returns up to 10 locations found by the given search query.You can use category ("hotels", "attractions", "restaurants", "geos"), phone number, address, and latitude/longtitude to search with more accuracy.

parameters.name: searchQuery
parameters.description: Text to use for searching based on the name of the location

parameters.name: category
parameters.description: Filters result set based on property type. Valid options are "hotels", "attractions", "restaurants", and "geos"

parameters.name: phone
parameters.description: Phone number to filter the search results by (this can be in any format with spaces and dashes but without the "+" sign at the beginning)

parameters.name: address
parameters.description: Address to filter the search results by

parameters.name: latLong
parameters.description: Latitude/Longitude pair to scope down the search around a specifc point - eg. "42.3455,-71.10767"

parameters.name: radius
parameters.description: Length of the radius from the provided latitude/longitude pair to filter results.

parameters.name: radiusUnit
parameters.description: Unit for length of the radius. Valid options are "km", "mi", "m" (km=kilometers, mi=miles, m=meters)

parameters.name: language
parameters.description: The language in which to return results (e.g. "en" for English or "es" for Spanish) from the list of our Supported Languages.

location_id.description: A unique identifier for a location on Tripadvisor. This is to be used in the other endpoints that require a location ID.

distance.description: Distance, in miles, this location is from the passed in LatLong parameters

bearing.description: Direction this location is from the passed in LatLong parameters

address_obj.description: Object consisting of various address data

address_string.description: The address in one single sentence

get.description: The Nearby Location Search request returns up to 10 locations found near the given latitude/longtitude.You can use category ("hotels", "attractions", "restaurants", "geos"), phone number, address to search with more accuracy.

parameters.name: latLong
parameters.description: Latitude/Longitude pair to scope down the search around a specifc point - eg. "42.3455,-71.10767"

parameters.name: category
parameters.description: Filters result set based on property type. Valid options are "hotels", "attractions", "restaurants", and "geos"

parameters.name: phone
parameters.description: Phone number to filter the search results by (this can be in any format with spaces and dashes but without the "+" sign at the beginning)

parameters.name: address
parameters.description: Address to filter the search results by

parameters.name: radius
parameters.description: Length of the radius from the provided latitude/longitude pair to filter results.

parameters.name: radiusUnit
parameters.description: Unit for length of the radius. Valid options are "km", "mi", "m" (km=kilometers, mi=miles, m=meters)

parameters.name: language
parameters.description: The language in which to return results (e.g. "en" for English or "es" for Spanish) from the list of our Supported Languages.

location_id.description: A unique identifier for a location on Tripadvisor. This is to be used in the other endpoints that require a location ID.

distance.description: Distance, in miles, this location is from the passed in LatLong parameters

bearing.description: Direction this location is from the passed in LatLong parameters

address_obj.description: Object consisting of various address data

address_string.description: The address in one single sentence
